entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:02:11
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Elon Musk stayed up playing video games in a Vancouver hotel until 5:30 a.m. after he offered to buy Twitter, because he was in 'stress mode'
- A MAGA news network isn't sure if it got duped by an AI version of Trump in a 17-minute call
- Apple Clarifies Why It Abandoned Plan to Detect CSAM in iCloud Photos
- Google pulls popular but controversial live video chat app Chamet from the Play Store
- Unlocking the Black Box: A Quantitative Law for Understanding Data Processing in Deep Neural Networks
- Podcast: Roi Ravhon on FinOps, Application Unit Economics, and Cloud Cost Optimization
- Teslaâ€™s upgraded Model 3 has a new design, rear touchscreen, and range improvements
- Understanding the Dark Side of Large Language Models: A Comprehensive Guide to Security Threats and Vulnerabilities
- Presentation: 5 Principles for Enablement with (Almost) Nothing to do with Building Tools

Business:
- Companies are shuffling people around more than they were a year ago. Here's how to know what your reassignment really means.
- UBS made a $29 billion quarterly profit after rescuing Credit Suisse
- Warren Buffett and Vivek Ramaswamy are miles apart politically. But the investing icon and Republican upstart have a few things in common.
- Millions of student-loan borrowers' balances are now starting to grow again after over 3 years
- Mortgage Interest Rates Today, September 1, 2023 | 30-Year Rates Fall
- I earned up to $130K in tech roles, but the jobs felt fake. Here's why I think startups hire people to build a brand only to fire them later on.
- AMC Theatres, revived by Barbie, will get a fall boost from another blonde icon
- Wealthy Family Wants to Reopen Major Industrial Polluter in Alabama Despite Mounting Debts and Proposed Regulation
- China tries again to support its battered economy, bringing in new measures to boost the yuan
- Dollarization is the only way for Argentina to stop its 'death spiral', economist Steve Hanke says

AI:
- A MAGA news network isn't sure if it got duped by an AI version of Trump in a 17-minute call
- Unlocking the Black Box: A Quantitative Law for Understanding Data Processing in Deep Neural Networks
- Understanding the Dark Side of Large Language Models: A Comprehensive Guide to Security Threats and Vulnerabilities

Other:
- TCU Football vs. Colorado: Staff Predictions And Game Previews - Sports Illustrated
- My husband and I couldn't afford to buy a home in Nashville, so we moved into an RV instead. We've been able to upgrade our vehicle, but haven't made the leap to homeownership.
- The Hottest Summer Ever And The Water Crisis: Building A Sustainable Future
- Cyber Autumn: Captivating Cybersecurity Conferences To Dive Into This October 2023
- US will regulate nursing home staffing for first time, but proposal lower than many advocates hoped
- Muhammad Yunus, the father of microfinance, is facing a prison sentence
- Burning Man is underway. Here are the famous CEOs and billionaires who have attended tech bros' favorite party, from Elon Musk to Ray Dalio.
- I left NYC for Tulsa, Oklahoma. I only planned to stay for a year, but I love the lower cost of living and slower pace.
- Presentation: 5 Principles for Enablement with (Almost) Nothing to do with Building Tools

Insights:
- The tech industry is experiencing advancements in AI, with concerns arising about the use of AI-generated content and the security threats associated with large language models.
- The business sector is seeing shifts in company structures and profits, as well as discussions on student loans, mortgage rates, and economic measures.
- Other topics range from sports predictions and game previews to personal stories, environmental issues, cybersecurity, and lifestyle choices.
- Overall, the report highlights the intersection of technology, business, and various other aspects of life, showcasing the diverse landscape of current news and trends.
